channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: In Trump’s Tariff Era, the Right to Repair Will Be More Important Than Ever
item.description: The tech we buy is about to get more expensive. It's time to keep the stuff you already have running longer.

item.title: These Apps Help You Visualize What's Hogging Your Hard Drive
item.description: Your cluttered hard drive has never looked so good.

item.title: Best GoRuck Backpacks (2025): Rucking, Hiking, and Every Day Carry
item.description: If you need a backpack that will never die, a GoRuck works for rucking, hiking, travel, and every day carry.
